SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Represents an application submitted by a student for a specific internship opportunity.
ApplicationDataService
Service layer responsible for higher-level application management operations, sitting above the repository layer.
ApplicationRepository
Repository abstraction for managing Application entities.
ApplicationStatus
Defines all possible states an internship application may transition through during its lifecycle.
ApproveCompanyRepService
Service used by Career Center Staff to approve or reject pending CompanyRep accounts.
ApproveInternshipService
Service used by Career Center Staff to review and approve or reject pending Internship submissions created by Company Representatives.
AuthService
Provides authentication services for the system.
BaseMenu
Abstract parent class for all authenticated menus in the system (StudentMenu, CompanyRepMenu, StaffMenu).
CompanyRep
Represents a Company Representative user in the Internship Management System.
CompanyRepMenu
Menu interface for authenticated Company Representative users.
CreateInternshipService
Service responsible for handling the creation of new internship opportunities by a Company Representative.
CsvPersistenceService
Service responsible for all CSV persistence operations in the system.
CSVUtil
Utility class providing simple CSV reading and writing functionality.
DataManager
Central coordinator for all data-related operations.
DeleteInternshipService
Service responsible for deleting internship opportunities created by a Company Representative.
EditInternshipService
Service responsible for editing internship opportunities created by a Company Representative.
FilterInternshipsService
Service class that handles internship filtering for Company Representatives.
FilterInternshipsStaffService
Service that enables Career Center Staff to apply filters and view internships based on multiple criteria such as status, major, level, company, visibility, and closing date.
FilterSettings
Represents a set of filter preferences used when viewing or sorting lists of internship opportunities.
IMenu
Represents a generic menu interface in the Internship Management System.
InMemoryApplicationRepository
In-memory implementation of ApplicationRepository.
InMemoryInternshipRepository
In-memory implementation of InternshipRepository.
InMemoryUserRepository
In-memory implementation of UserRepository.
Internship
Represents a concrete internship opportunity created by a Company Representative.
InternshipDataService
Service layer that manages all domain-level operations related to Internship entities.
InternshipLevel
Represents the academic difficulty or experience level expected for an internship.
InternshipRepository
Repository interface for managing Internship entities.
ListInternshipsService
Service responsible for listing all internships created by a specific Company Representative.
Main
Entry point for the Internship Hub CLI application.
MainMenu
Represents the unauthenticated entry menu of the Internship Hub system.
MenuFactory
Factory class responsible for creating the correct role-specific menu implementation based on the authenticated user's type.
Opportunity
Abstract base class for various types of opportunities offered in the system (currently implemented only as internships).
OpportunityStatus
Represents the lifecycle status of an internship opportunity.
PasswordService
Provides password-changing functionality for any type of user in the system.
ProcessWithdrawalService
Service that allows Career Center Staff to process withdrawal requests submitted by students for their internship applications.
ReviewApplicationsService
Service class responsible for allowing Company Representatives to review, approve, or reject applications submitted for their internship postings.
Staff
Represents a Career Center Staff user in the Internship Management System.
StaffMenu
Menu interface for authenticated Career Center Staff users.
Student
Represents a Student user in the Internship Management System.
StudentFilterInternshipsService
Provides filtering functionality for students to search internships based on previously selected or newly entered filter criteria.
StudentManageApplicationsService
Provides the functionality for students to view and manage their internship applications.
StudentMenu
Menu interface for authenticated Student users.
StudentViewAllInternshipsService
Provides the functionality for students to view all currently available internships and apply to them.
ToggleVisibilityService
Service class that allows a Company Representative to toggle the visibility of their internship postings.
User
Abstract base class for all user types in the Internship Management System.
UserDataService
Service layer responsible for domain-level operations on User entities.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing User entities.
